about_the_game:
Introducing Unreal Table Ball, the ultimate virtual arcade game created by Lockyz Media!

In this game, you'll compete against your friends or the computer in exciting matches that will keep you on the edge of your seat. But, we've added a twist, power-ups! These powerups include super speed, to increase your speed and give you the win.

You'll use your paddle to bounce the ball back and forth across the screen, trying to outmanoeuvre your opponent and score the most points.

With intuitive controls, Unreal Table Ball is the perfect game for players of all ages and skill levels. So why wait? Start playing today and see if you have what it takes to come out on top!

Differences between the Demo and the Main Game

Unreal Table Ball Demo is the Table Ball you know and love, however has been remade in Unreal Engine. We decided to go with a "Demo" build until such a time that we've replicated most of the original games features, before we replace it as an update.

This version of the game only includes the base game mode (Table Ball), and does NOT include the Endless or SCPC (Space Game) game modes, or certain advanced game settings. Other features within the base game may also not be present in the current version of the Unreal Table Ball Demo, please be sure to check out our social media for an updated list!

Game Modes

Table Ball

The Table Ball Game mode resembles the classic game with one big difference, powerups. You can use for example the Speed boost powerup to give yourself that extra speed.

highlighted.name: Are you just bad at this?
Once An Accident, Twice A Coincidence, Thrice A Pattern

name: Unreal Table Ball Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 - 64-bit
  • Processor: Quad-Core Intel or AMD, 2.5GHz or Faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: None
  • VR Support: OpenXR. Device Support Unknown. Only some builds include the VR Mode.
  • Additional Notes: The System Requirements are based on the requirements for Unreal Engine 5. We do not have the capabilities to run the game using less specifications.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11 - 64-bit
  • Processor: Quad-Core Intel or AMD, 2.5GHz or Faster
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 2070 SUPER
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: None
  • VR Support: OpenXR. Device Support Unknown. Only some builds include the VR Mode.
  • Additional Notes: The System Requirements are based on the requirements for Unreal Engine 5. We do not have the capabilities to run the game using less specifications.

short_description: Unreal Table Ball by Lockyz Media is the ultimate virtual arcade game! Compete against friends or the computer in exciting matches of top-down Ping Pong. This game is perfect for players of all skill levels. Start playing today and see if you have what it takes to come out on top!
